title: The solotype series?
content: can someone shed a light on them? i heard of the "old" ones published in 1977 or something by dover. also there seem to be the same books but incl. a font cd - which i guess is not from 1977. what are those fonts about? what are the books about? thanks: lars
author: lars

comments.content:
I tried to get in touch with them last year for an alphabet matter but I couldn't, I don't think they have an e-mail /web site address either, Ah! and they are always close in october to hunt for more type, I hope they still do.   
   
Lars, I can't tell you much but if You Like Type I recomend you [The Solotype Catalog](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221246/http:/store.yahoo.com/doverpublications/0486271692.html), tons of different typefaces, no complete alphabets but small samples, but it is worth it and inspiring, or just for the fun of it, ... and there are some funny things along the pages ...   
   
 ![solo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/19776.gif)
